name: Link
description: Navigation link to another page or form

properties.label: Type
properties.name: type
properties.help: Specifies the type of link to create

properties.label: Page token
properties.name: pageToken
properties.help: As used in the URL after the application token

properties.label: Frame
properties.name: target
properties.help: Specifies where to open the linked document

properties.label: Application URL token
properties.name: appToken
properties.caption: Will be retrieved from the URL if not set ('app' parameter). You can pass it in the query string of the preview URL for tests.
properties.help: Determines the application theme that will be used by the target page. It is recommended not to hard code it.

properties.label: Application URL token
properties.name: appToken
properties.caption: Will be retrieved from the URL if not set ('app' parameter). You can pass it in the query string of the preview URL for tests.
properties.help: Determines target application. It is recommended not to hard code it.

properties.label: URL parameters
properties.name: urlParams
properties.caption: A JSON object
properties.help: Additional request parameters added to the query string
